name: swap
description: Seller-executed same-chain token swap via LI.FI DEX aggregation. Buyer transfers funds to executor (ACP requiredFunds). Supports chains: ethereum, base, arbitrum, polygon, bsc. Any token supported via LI.FI.

tokenIn.description: Source token symbol (e.g. USDC, WETH, USDT, DAI) or contract address.

tokenOut.description: Destination token symbol or contract address.

receiver.description: Receiver address for the swapped tokens.

slippage.description: Slippage as decimal (0.005=0.5%) OR percent (0.5=0.5%). Default 0.5%.

command.description: Alternative: natural-language command. Example: 'swap 5 USDC to ETH on base receiver 0x...'

dryRun.description: If true, only returns quote/txRequest without broadcasting.
